level.heading: Power of legal representative of deceased partner.
level.text: If a partner dies, the deceased partner's legal representative may exercise:
The rights of a transferee provided in ยง 29-605.03(c); and
For purposes of settling the estate, the rights the deceased partner had under ยง 29-604.06.

level.heading: Editor's Notes
level.text: Application of Law 19-210: Section 7 of D.C. Law 19-210 provided that the act shall apply as of January 1, 2012.
